alert.note: Alert for Clay (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 10 at 8:51AM CDT until May 17 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Grand Forks ND has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Minnesota... Buffalo River near Dilworth affecting Clay County. .Due to recent rainfall from thunderstorms, the Buffalo River near Dilworth is beginning to see a response. Anticipating a jump up to Action stage moving toward the weekend, peaking in Minor flood stage across the weekend. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE FRIDAY NIGHT TO EARLY WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Buffalo River near Dilworth. * WHEN...From late Friday night to early Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 15.8 feet, Road west of gage begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 9.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Saturday morning to a crest of 15.5 feet Sunday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Monday evening. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
